info.title: Airbnb API
info.description: Move your app forward with the airbnb API

get.description:
The allListings endpoint returns information about the *Airbnb* listing
offered at a given location. The response includes the countries name,and lists the products in the
proper display order.

get.description: The getUserProfile endpoint returns the profile of the user

200.description: returns Profile information for a user

post.description: User is trying to book a new property.

401.description: Cannot book a trip since dates are not avaiable

405.description: Cannot book a trip due to internal issue

post.description: User is trying to edit a already booked property.

200.description: successfull edited the trip but pending approval

401.description: Cannot edit a trip since dates are not avaiable

405.description: Cannot edit a trip due to internal issue

post.description: User is trying to cancel a already booked property which is not yet completerd.

401.description: Cannot cancel a trip since trip dates are nearby, depends on the house rules

405.description: Cannot cancel a trip due to internal issue

get.summary: View Trip History for this user
get.description: User is trying to veiw his/her booking/trip history

200.description: Array of all the trips  from this user including completed trips,pending approval trips,rejected trips and accepted trips(which are yet to be taken)

405.description: Cannot fetch trip history due to internal issue

city_id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific city for a given latitude & longitude.

list_id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific listing for a given latitude & longitude.

list_type.description: Type of room that will be listed ex private room, Entire Home/apt.

list_reviews.description: Number of reviews for that property.

list_ratings.description: Rating given by users for that property.

list_images.description: array of images uploaded by host for that property.

host_avatar.description: avatar of the host to show along with the listed property.

userId.description: userID of the host to fetch his details.
Unique identifier representing a specific User.

list_id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific property list.
Unique identifier representing a specific listing for a given latitude & longitude.

list_type.description: Type of room that will be listed ex private room, Entire Home/apt.

list_reviews.description: Number of reviews for that property.

list_ratings.description: Rating given by users for that property.

list_images.description: array of images uploaded by host for that property.

list_space.description: array containing the information about available space of the listed property  like Accommodates, Bathrooms, Bed type, Bedrooms,Room type,Property type,Check Out,Check In

list_amenties.description: array containing the information about amenties provied in the property like Kitchen, Internet, Heating, Washer, Iron etc.

list_price.description: array containing the information about price details of the listed property like Extra People, Weekly Discount, Cleaning Fee, Monthly Discount, Security Deposit, Cancellation

list_rules.description: rules of the listed property like No smoking, Not suitable for pets,No parties or events ,Check-in is after 2PM

list_safetyFeatures.description: description of the  safety equipments in the listed property like Smoke detector.

list_availability.description: description of the  conditions and dates when it will be available, 3 nights minimum stay. Like "From Dec 01, 2016 - Feb 28, 2017 the minimum stay is 4 nights."

list_reviews.description: array of the reviews of the listed property

list_images.description: array of images uploaded by host for that property.

host_avatar.description: avatar of the host to show along with the listed property.

userId.description: userID of the host to fetch his details.

list_videos.description: video  uploaded by host for that property.

noofguest.description: No of people who will be staying.

list_price.description: Price of the property multiplied by number of days.

user_billConfirmationCode.description: Unique identifier representing a specific Bill.

user_name.description: Full user name First name and Last Name.

list_type.description: Type of room that will be listed ex private room, Entire Home/apt.

trip_guests.description: Number of guests booked for the trip.

trip_checkin.description: checkin date - time for the room

trip_checkout.description: checkout date - time for the room

trip_securityDeposit.description: Deposite taken at the time of booking.

trip_accommodationPerNight.description: per night cost for the room.

trip_airbnbConcierge.description: per night cost for the room.
